description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Shelly Manne, ca. Dec. 1946] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Caption from Down Beat: Drummed up answer from Shelley Manne, Stan Kenton's skin man. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 224 Reference print available in Music Division, Library of Congress. Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). In: "Posin'," Down Beat, v. 15, no. 25 (Dec. 2, 1946), p. 3. Subjects: Manne, Shelly Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Drummers (Musicians)--1940-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950. Rights Info: Mr. Gottlieb has dedicated these works to the public domain, but rights of privacy and publicity may apply. lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-copyrig... Repository: (negative) Library of Congress, Prints & Photographs Division, Washington D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print (reference print) Library of Congress, Music Division, Washington D.C. 20540 USA, loc.gov/rr/perform/ Part Of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (DLC) 99-401005 General information about the Gottlieb Collection is available at lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-home.html Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.music/gottlieb.05991 Call Number: LC-GLB23- 0599
